N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-3.13 - Transfer of the permit before closure

State Regulations

Prior to closure of the land disposal facility, a permit
may only be transferred to another party by modification of the permit in
accordance with section
383-3.12
of this Subpart. A permit
will only be transferred upon a demonstration that the prospective transferee
will be able to comply with the applicable laws and regulations, the permit, and other requirements to which the prospective transferor is
subject. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
